caption.body: In this short by Puerto Rican-born filmmaker Pati Cruz Martínez, Maritere (Tete) receives a visit from an old friend during her husband’s funeral that reawakens feelings from the past.   See “La amante (The Mistress)” by Pati Cruz Martínez, in gallery only, in the Video Arts Gallery, located pre-security in the International Terminal with daily operating hours of 7:00am to 10:00pm. https://bit.ly/3Q1bCAY  To view the complete film, follow the link below: https://vimeo.com/531061256
caption.excerpt: In this short by Puerto Rican-born filmmaker Pati Cruz Martínez, Maritere (Tete) receives a visit from an old friend during her husband’s funeral that reawakens feelings from the past.
